references.paper_title: Adversarial watermarking transformer: Towards tracing text provenance with data hiding
references.reason: This paper is foundational for adversarial watermarking techniques, which are central to the current work's methodology.

references.paper_title: A watermark for large language models
references.reason: This paper is a seminal work on watermarking LLMs, directly influencing the approach to multi-bit watermarking in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Robust distortion-free watermarks for language models
references.reason: This paper addresses the robustness challenges of LLMs which are directly relevant to the robustness analysis of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Waterfall: Framework for robust and scalable text watermarking
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel text watermarking framework that addresses many of the same challenges as the current work, allowing for a direct comparison of performance.

references.paper_title: Learning to watermark LLM-generated text via reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduces a co-training framework for watermarking that is directly adopted and extended in the current work.
